entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
